dataIdInfo.idPurp: The tools in the toolset are used to classify a bathymetry grid or a slope-gradient grid into three 'surface' categories: Plane, Slope and Escarpment.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The toolset contains two tools. Please see detailed metadata of each tool

  • Morphological Surface Tool Bathymetry: This tool classifies an area into three "surface" categories: Plane, Slope and Escarpment from a bathymetric data.

  • Morphological Surface Tool Slope: This tool classifies an area into three "surface" categories: Plane, Slope and Escarpment from a slope gradient grid.

searchKeys.keyword: This toolset contains tools used for the classification of a bathymetry data into 'surface' categories.
